storageNamePrefix.value: (prefix for storage account name, max of 11 lower case letters like oprovprod)

CLIENT_ID.value: (your Azure AD v1 app id with app permissions)

TEMPLATE_SITE_URL.value: (your SharePoint site for holding templates like /sites/TeamsProvisioning)

TEMPLATE_LIB_NAME.value: (your SharePoint document library for templates like Templates)
